body.name: ZOSI 1080P HD Security Camera Indoor Outdoor,1920TVL 2.0MP 4-in-1 HD TVI/CVI/AHD/CVBS CCTV Camera,Weatherproof,80ft IR Night Vision,for 960H,720P,1080P,5MP,4K Analog Home Surveillance DVR System
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 24 mins
features: 【2. 0 MP 1080P 4-in-1 security camera】-- - this 4-in-1 TVI/CVI/AHD/CVBS dome camera. Compatible with HD-TVI, AHD, CVI, and CVBS/960H analog DVRs. High performance lens captures everything in great detail and presents true-to-life color on screen.

【Bulit in OSD Menu】-- It comes with OSD Menu which can change 4 different video output. 720P AHD, 720P CVI, 720P TVI and 960H CVBS .Default Video mode is 960H mode, compatible with all analog DVRs. 720P video mode must be switched according to your 720P DVR type. Widely Usage: With OSD Menu, you can change signal mode freely and quickly in 5 seconds.

【IP66 Weatherproof Camera,80ft Night Vision】--This Camera use High Quality ABS materials, Can be installed in outdoor or indoor place. ,Built in 24pcs IR LEDs, Up to 80ft night vision in total darkness and 130ft Night vision in ambient light.More than 3.0Lux the night vision is color.

【4 mode video output】-- - 1080P AHD, 1080P CVI, 1080P TVI and CVBS. Default video mode is 960H mode, compatible with all TVI DVRs. Other video mode must be switched according to your DVR type. Widely usage: with OSD button, you can change signal mode freely and quickly in 5 seconds.
【Noted 】-- - This is a single camera, it did not come with DVR and power supply &video power cable! Since this is hard-wired camera, it need to connect to the DVR to work (not included).
body.description: ZOSI 1080P 4-IN-1 Security Wired Camera Camera Specification Noted: this is a wired security camera, and it could be the additional or replacement camera for the wired security system. Image Sensor: 1/3〞CMOS CMOS with IR-Cut. Active Pixels: 1920(H)×1080(V). Lens: 3.6mm IR LEDs Amount: 24pcs, 5mm LEDs IR Distance: up to 80ft. Viewing angle:90 degree Weather - Resistant Singal mode: TVI / AHD / CVI / CVBS 960H.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 4-in-1 Security Dome Camera Press OSD joystick to switch the output mode: Default / UP for 5 seconds: CVBS 960H Right for 5 seconds: TVI Down for 5 seconds: CVI Left for 5 seconds: AHD ZOSI 1080P 4-IN-1 Security Wired Camera Camera Specification Noted: this is a wired security camera, and it could be the additional or replacement camera for the wired security system. Image Sensor: 1/3〞CMOS CMOS with IR-Cut. Active Pixels: 1920(H)×1080(V). Lens: 3.6mm IR LEDs Amount: 24pcs, 5mm LEDs IR Distance: up to 80ft. Viewing angle:90 degree Weather - Resistant Singal mode: TVI / AHD / CVI / CVBS 960H.

This 1080p full HD camera has a built-in OSD menu that can change the 4 different video outputs：HD-TVI, AHD, CVI, and CVBS(960H)， and adjust the video settings. Operation Mode： Switch from AHD: Press Leftward for 5 Seconds Switch from TVI: Press Rightward for 5 Seconds Switch from CVBS: Press Upward for 5 Seconds Switch from CVI: Press Downward for 5 Seconds Noted: Default Video Mode is Analog 960H Mode

1080p Full HD See everything in details with true 1080p HD resolution. Get clearer and smoother images/videos than 720p cameras. Clear Night Vision Equipped with 24pcs infrared LEDs, this camera can see up to 80ft in darkness. 3.6mm HD lens with IR-CUT captures clear image and video at night. Flexible Installation Mount this camera on the ceiling or on the wall. It’s simple to place it anywhere indoor and outdoor for all-round surveillance.

Troubleshooting Q: Video Loss appears where the image from my camera should be displaying on my DVR? A: 1.Check the extension cable (power and video) is securely connected to the camera. 2.Check the video output from the camera is securely connected to a video input channel on the DVR. 3.Check the power from the camera is securely connected to a power supply. 4. The camera mode do not match your DVR.there is 2 ways to setup . (1) Press OSD Joystick “DOWN” 5 seconds,if still no picture come, try to press “LEFT” “RIGHT””UP” for 5 second, till the signal matching your DVR. (2) Make sure the signal of your DVR, Use OSD Joystick to change the mode of the camera according to your DVRs video Mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality. Easy installation
reviews.reviewText: Love the features and security protection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Video is good quality. The tilt of the camera is restricted
reviews.reviewText: Video is good quality but you can't adjust the camera tilt very well because the video cable hits the inside housing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent cameras and quality
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. Night mode is very bright even in pitch black conditions. Tech support is amazing. Had an issue with one camera and next day they sent me two brand new ones. Literally had the new ones the next morning on a Sunday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap is only, "good."
reviews.reviewText: Wow... So, this is now and all plastic-y camera... The optics are pretty good, and good color, but I never thought I'd see a fully plastic camera base... I've done a lot of CCTV camera installs, so none of this really threw me for a loop, but for the "first timer" it might be hard to figure out how to go about installing this. Hint: Go slow and figure it out BEFORE you get near a ladder. After that, it's mostly just a matter of juggling things until you get it all up in the air and pointed the way you want it. And, once it's all set, it just MIGHT stay where you put it. Might... There's no way to tighten the base to hold the camera ball, and oh yeah, you'll have to drill a HUGE hole to tuck in the "4 way" tiny joystick that manages the camera settings. But, if you go slow and work carefully you'll get a little more than you paid for. Not a bad camera - just a lower quality situation in terms of mounting - and probably, longevity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Company has great service.
reviews.reviewText: The USPS missed delivered , and the company sent me another one before I was off the phone. You can't beat that for service. I have two of these cams replace my bullet cams and they work just fine for my setup. next step is a PTZ cam. Night vision is ok for the range it was intended. For a home setting you cannot go wrong. Give them your business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money
reviews.reviewText: The camera system did not give any of the features it said. The picture clarity is like looking at a 1990s camera in my small 780 ft² house cameras dropped signal every 5 minutes you could not use the two-way talk and it never once gave color All complaints are done by email same with communication from zossi. Ordered on a Thursday hooked up on a Friday disassembled and returned Sunday. When I sent it UPS I got a notice from Amazon saying they can keep my money for up to 30 days upon talking with several managers they still have not released my money back for it Even though they've had the product Will be going to my bank later to contest order because all my attempts have failed through Amazon to get my money back I will be closing my prime account due to Amazon's lack and service and products getting stolen from factory

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good things can come in damaged packaging or from buyers remorse
reviews.reviewText: I got this camera for half the money, it works great. I'm slowly upgrading to all HD camera's. Soon I'll be in the market for an Full HD DVR

Customer service rep Slina as given me great confidence with Zosi for their dedication in addressing customer concerns. I'll be looking forward to accessing more Zosi product as it was a positive experence. Thank you again for all the many correspondences and attention on my behalf in resolving any issue, Slina.
A very compact camera for outside usage. but in a protected environment.

reviews.reviewTitle: For the price, this is a good little camera.
reviews.reviewText: The four-in-one switch is a little difficult to hide if you're mounting this on the outside of your house and you're trying to hide the cable but other than that it seems to be a nice camera. The infrared night light seems to pulse, it's not a steady on, but it's not a problem either. I bought three more. Works with NightOwl systems.
I bought 3 cameras. The lense get foggy in the moisture at night.I contacted customer service and they replaced all cameras with the newer version of the cameras.5 star to customer service
Camera seems good quality picture. But the plastic base broke immediately in the cold weather outside. The design for tightening the finished angle is poor.
